author: WGN 9
title: Ground News - Chicago Area in for some Snow; two winter storms threaten Upper Midwest
text:
Summary by WGN 9 Tens of Millions of people woke up to freezing temperatures Thursday morning Nearly 40% or 132 million people across the lower 48 woke up to temperatures at or below freezing Thursday morning, including teens across portions of the Great Lakes and single digits in parts of the North Woods. (Images Courtesy: weathermodels.com) Chicago Area Snow Forecast: Greatest accumulations expected along IL/WI border, but heaviest likely in southern Wisco… Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
